sect2.title: System.ToDecimal
sect2.para: The Evaluate operator dynamicly evaluates a string as D4 code.
If AProcessID is specified the evaluation will be done on the specified process, otherwise it will be done on the current process.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: select Evaluate("6 - 2"); select Evaluate("Arg1 + Arg2", row { 2 Arg1, 6 Arg2 });
